value.0:
Violine gems are purple and volcanic in nature.

Violine stones are considered sacred by followers of Ghaunadaur appropriate for sacrifice, or to be consecrated for use, or recognized as boons or omens when found. 

This gem is proof against mummy rot. A creature with mummy rot only had to touch a violine crystal and the mummy rot was removed. The violine is completely consumed by this process. If this stone comes into contact with an actual mummy, it burst and damaged the mummy. If a mummy is destroyed by contact with violine, the resulting mummy dust was inert and could not be used as a spell component or for other magical purposes.
